name: Nox (itch)
description:
Year 2046, it rains a substance that destroys everything it touches, you have to escape or you will die for sure. Prototype based on one of the early workshop of  the gamedev learning platform https://www.gamecodeur.fr/

Rules : 

To escape the nox plague you must go through lava tiles which are located somewhere on the map. Lava kills you. Generated weird green nox tiles kills you too.

You can cut the trees and make water bucket with it (bucket are automatically filled with water lol).

Controls :

  • Arrows to control the little guy.
  • E to cut trees (careful little guy is not strong enough).
  • F to create a water bucket (you need 3 piece of wood to do so).
  • E to use a water bucket.

Engine used : Love2D (https://love2d.org/)
